--create topic testtopic;
use test;
0 rows returned
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 tinyint,
    col2 int,
    col3 double,
    primary key (col0, col2)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        k.k0,
        v.v1,
        v.v2,
        v.v3
    ),
    properties = (
        "prop1" = "val1",
        "prop2" = "val2"
    )
);
0 rows returned

select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
|col0|col1|col2|col3|
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_1;
select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
|col0|col1|col2|col3|
|1|100|1000|1234.4321|
|2|200|2000|2234.4321|
|3|300|3000|3234.4321|
|4|400|4000|4234.4321|
|5|500|5000|5234.4321|
|6|600|6000|6234.4321|
|7|700|7000|7234.4321|
|8|800|8000|8234.4321|
|9|900|9000|9234.4321|
|10|1000|10000|10234.4321|
10 rows returned

drop source test_source_1;
0 rows returned

select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
Failed to execute statement: PDB0002 - Table 'test.test_source_1' doesn't exist

drop source test_source_1;
Failed to execute statement: PDB0005 - Unknown source: test.test_source_1

--delete topic testtopic;
